import { memo, useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Sidebar, Menu, MenuItem, SubMenu, useProSidebar } from 'react-pro-sidebar'; import { englishAdminMenu, vietnameseAdminMenu } from '../../Languages/AdminMenu'; import { AiFillCaretLeft, AiFillCaretRight } from 'react-icons/ai' import Dashboard from '../../images/dashboard.png' import Suppliers from '../../images/supplier.png' import Services from '../../images/services.png' import Booking from '../../images/booking.png' import Customers from '../../images/customer.png' import Partners from '../../images/partners.png' import Feedback from '../../images/feedback.png' import ServiceConfirm from '../../images/service_confirm.png' import './AdminHome.scss' function AdminHome({ languageSelected, children }) { let adminMenuLabel = (languageSelected === 'EN' ? englishAdminMenu : vietnameseAdminMenu) let pathName = window.location.pathname console.log(pathName) const { collapseSidebar } = useProSidebar(); const [isOpenSidebar, setOpenSidebar] = useState(true) const handleClickOpenCloseSidebar = () => { setOpenSidebar(!isOpenSidebar); collapseSidebar(); } return (
: }> } className='menu-item-left'>{adminMenuLabel.txtDashboard} } className='menu-item-left menu-sub-main' label={adminMenuLabel.txtSuppliers}> {adminMenuLabel.txtAccommodation} {adminMenuLabel.txtEntertainment} {adminMenuLabel.txtAccommodation} } className='menu-item-left menu-sub-main' label={adminMenuLabel.txtService}> {adminMenuLabel.txtTourProduct} } className='menu-item-left'>{adminMenuLabel.txtBooking} } className='menu-item-left'>{adminMenuLabel.txtCustomer} } className='menu-item-left'>{adminMenuLabel.txtPartner} } className='menu-item-left'>{adminMenuLabel.txtFeedback} } className='menu-item-left'>{adminMenuLabel.txtServiceConfirm}
{children}
) } export default memo(AdminHome)
